title: The Good, The Bad, and the League: 12/14 - 1/3
body:
_Your semi-weekly dose of server problem-os, NA League news, and other! _

2019 has ended, and 2020 is just starting. We’ve got a fresh new patch incoming, start of the new season, and a bunch of “It’s 2020 where’s new news riot” memes as well.  

**Follow-Ups:**

* **Mac voice still not working properly** Bug grouped with other Mac bugs. More .plist fun (No progress since last check).

**Ongoing**

* **None**

**Server Stuff: **

* **Custom Player game minimum set to 10(12/15, ~92 minutes)** NOC is notified by automated alerting that CPU usage across game servers is approaching warning limits. To ensure the limit isn’t exceeded, the NOC sets custom games to a minimum of 10 players, alleviating the load slightly. Once the CPU usage falls back to normal levels, the NOC re-enables practice tool and removes all ticker updates.

* **CPU Mitigation Steps(12/15, ~92 minutes)** Reports filter in that the CPU usage is above the ideal threshold. In response, the NOC disables the practice tool, sets minimum custom players to 10 per game, and starts throttling non-ranked queues. Once the CPU usage falls below the red line, the NOC returns all queues to normal. 

**Game Stuff: **

* **TFT Elemental Pass rewards 10 and 11 disappeared from TFT Tab(12/30, ~13 hours)** Player Support notifies the NOC about reports regarding battlepass 10 and 11 not being available for TFT. Escalation and notification of the appropriate team finds the missions were set to expire at the wrong time. The missions are changed to expire appropriately, fixing the problem.

_Morgageddon_

replies.body: The Client has far more issues than whats listed here and its so bad that playing ranked right now can me a huge liability.
Fix your fucking client.
Where are all the client  bugs??? Like the one where sometimes you couldnt edit rune pages in champ select???

> [{quoted}](name=ChrisBrownze,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=nfToEEPG,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2020-01-07T13:03:54.449+0000)
>
> Where are all the client  bugs??? Like the one where sometimes you couldnt edit rune pages in champ select???

I only see problems that are player impacting within a time frame on NA. If that bug first showed up here during this period, and was internally tracked, it'd be up there. It could be that the specific bug you're thinking of already exists and is being tracked or worked on, or isn't in the database. Could be old enough it's been tracked for a while, or lumped in with other client impacting bugs. 

Unfortunately, I'm not assigned to any team that actually edits code (client, game, etc). I can raise visibility around issues seen and unseen though.
blind fuck
Lol not a mention of the client issues, yet there are thousands of posts about it on the forums...delusional
all this about cpu are you talking about peoples processor's overheating?

> [{quoted}](name=DarknesTheDragon,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=nfToEEPG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2020-01-09T09:03:42.747+0000)
>
> all this about cpu are you talking about peoples processor's overheating?

Server CPU! If y'all's PCs were overheating, you'd have random Windows Shutdowns constantly happening :(

mine hit 109 degrees Fahrenheit thats why i asked cuz it only does it when i launch a game from your client. i have my entire room at freezing cold temp to compensate for it and im pretty sure its because of a combination of your client and windows 7 being outdated. also where is the 2020 dev video on league's websites for people to log in and comment on. literally everything is broken btw i have to completely shutdown client and restart it several times a day to get it to semi-function and im being told its just going to be like that till i buy an entire new operating system (cuz thats so cheap right?) so cudos on that one.

> [{quoted}](name=DarknesTheDragon,realm=NA,application-id=6WpmgL9O,discussion-id=nfToEEPG,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2020-01-10T21:54:23.218+0000)
>
> mine hit 109 degrees Fahrenheit thats why i asked cuz it only does it when i launch a game from your client. i have my entire room at freezing cold temp to compensate for it and im pretty sure its because of a combination of your client and windows 7 being outdated. also where is the 2020 dev video on league's websites for people to log in and comment on. literally everything is broken btw i have to completely shutdown client and restart it several times a day to get it to semi-function and im being told its just going to be like that till i buy an entire new operating system (cuz thats so cheap right?) so cudos on that one.

109 F isn't too hot (barely hotter than the human body, that would be a really cool CPU temperature when running).
Now, if you're talking 109 C...that should force the auto-shutdown routine on your motherboard (you're boiling water at that point).
You might want to look at your case, see if the fans inside are clean and working, and whether there are problems with your CPU cooler (too much gunk on it, fan not working, if water cooled did the pump fail, etc).

I've cleaned it out blown out the radiator and everything fans are on max and the highest I've seen it hit STILL is 135 degrees and its only when launching your client. I've done everything i can to figure out whats going on short of tearing my computer apart. i haven't done anything to overclock it either so there shouldn't be any reasons for power surges or anything like that. my pc used to run on average around 68-87 degrees and i noticed it thermal throttling which is why i checked my temp and it was 114 and its only gotten worse every time i launch your client my temp goes so high it literally hits the top of my graph and i have to scroll over it to read what it is.

Please fix the in-game client setting "Enable screen shake" to be correctly applied when unchecked.
The bug is that it only applies to the game you actively disable the option, and then resets for every game afterwards causing the player to manually adjust this particular option every game. For players that hate the screen shaking which can also cause additional problems, please fix it.

So I bought the whole mecha pass, but every night the server is crapping out and we're getting 10+ minute queues. Are there any plans on extending the time of the pass or some sort of compensation so that I feel like I didn't waste my money buying the pass? I just want to play! T_T

If i get autofilled one more fucking time while my teammates all main the roles im filled into and are themselves also auotfilled into my role......... imma blow my load all over riot headquarters.
oh yeah ur client is dogshit, i get stuck at the endscreen maybe 20% of the fucking games i play and have to relog or wait over a minute just to re-queue again.  and thats not the only problem with it.  cant open hextech half the goddamn time.  cant look at profiles. friendslist is constantly down. friendlist is buggy. cant invite people. but u guys know this ur just sitting on ur ass hoping ur boss doesnt notice no work getting done right?

The True damage skin minus ekko used to have the stripped down version of Giants when the game started just like all the SG skins with their respected theme. Please readd the Stripped down version of Giants back into the skins would love to hear the instrumental when starting the game.

Im having issues seeing my "player inking" in visual settings actually activate or just be half inked characters in bushes. Additionally, when you start the game some champ models in fountain are rendered in "high" visuals it looks like while others look like I set it too low visual setting. 

Just an inconsistency, not a large issue. Yes Ive re-installed the game multiple times freshly, my computer freshly updated, and the issue occurs on other computers as well.
How about the bug where the hextec crafting bugs more than anything in the league?

1 the client if TFT is doing some sort of visual/graphics spasm then full game and comp crash.... has happened 2x since new season start

but now more importantly?... is this a joke? i understand its a new season and things & rankings restart... ok

but i play one game now i'm at the bottom of iron 4?!??!?!?! i was just working my way to silver 5 stuck in bronze 1/2 now i'm at iron 4? after one game?///// i've never been in iron before.... this is not out of protest but i am working towards my PhD and have other obligations... so now more than ever i believe its time ti quit League for good.
Yeah it probably is... Focus on your PhD...
